column4: you get perfect cancelation and theoretically zero radiated emission from the antenna, duh! :)
is the antenna a wave and could we even classify such a thing as an antenna ?
How do you conclude theoretically zero radiative emissions exist while the wave resonances match each other even with the interfacing?
but even then, the rules only apply (loosly) to conventional physics.
How do I conclude... it's just a, "feeling!"
Sorry... just talking out my... umm.. ya know! :)
ahh well on that note; I believe you are wrong
Let's save this for another channel and keep it on Ubuntu support though. :)
Yeah, probably.  But you can't prove it!

do not doubt that I can or cannot prove anything for I merely asked a question that very few have even asked or know anything about. For you to answer though is noble and my feelings are different that yos
Well, if you can prove it, you're far ahead of me or anyone else I know involved in quantum physics.  Anyway, interesting stuff for sure! :)
interesting indeed; now I just wish I had the money and people nessary to answer that question
assuming we all do is a logical fallacy
What...too much credit to human kind?
Yeah, you're right.  I should have said, "We all should."
that is a bit more idealistic and my fingers smell like tuna fish; FML
